name of the Lord cometh from far. The Lord will come from the distant heavens to cleanse the earth of the wicked.

burning with his anger/his lips are full of indignation, and his tongue as a devouring fire. These descriptive phrases speak of the destruction that will occur when the Lord comes to punish the wicked. The Hebrew word translated here as "anger" may also be translated "nose." Thus Isaiah describes God's countenance with the four terms nose, lips, tongue, and breath, connecting each with his anger and power to destroy.
